original: Atha kho āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai rādhaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai rādhaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca
kittāvatā nu kho bhante māro ti

original: “Rūpe kho, rādha, sati māro vā assa māretā vā yo vā pana mīyati.
analyzed: rūpe kho rādha sati māraḥ vai assa vā yaḥ vā pana mīyati

original: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, rādha, rūpaṁ māroti passa, māretāti passa, mīyatīti passa, rogoti passa, gaṇḍoti passa, sallanti passa, aghanti passa, aghabhūtanti passa.
analyzed: tasmāt ati ha tva rādha rūpam māroti passa māretāti passa mīyati iti passa rogoti passa gaṇḍoti passa sallanti passa aghanti passa agha bhūtanti passa

original: Ye naṁ evaṁ passanti te sammā passanti.
analyzed: ye naṃ evam passanti te sammā passanti

original: viññāṇe sati māro vā assa māretā vā yo vā pana mīyati.
analyzed: viññāṇe sati māraḥ vā assa māretā vā yaḥ vā pana mīyati

original: Tasmātiha tvaṁ, rādha, viññāṇaṁ māroti passa, māretāti passa, mīyatīti passa, rogoti passa, gaṇḍoti passa, sallanti passa, aghanti passa, aghabhūtanti passa.
analyzed: tasmā ati ha tva rādha viññāṇam māroti passa māretāti passa mīyati iti passa rogo ti passa gaṇḍo ti passa sallanti passa aghanti passa agha bhūtanti passa

original: Ye naṁ evaṁ passanti, te sammā passantī”ti.
analyzed: ye nam evam passanti te sammā passanti iti
sammādassanam pana bhante kim atthiyan ti
nibbidā pana bhante kim atthiyā ati
vimutti pana bhante kim atthiyā ti

original: “Accayāsi, rādha, pañhaṁ, nāsakkhi pañhassa pariyantaṁ gahetuṁ.
analyzed: accayāsi rādha pañha na asakkhi pañhassa pariyantam gahetu

original: Nibbānogadhañhi, rādha, brahmacariyaṁ vussati, nibbānaparāyanaṁ nibbānapariyosānan”ti.
analyzed: nibbāna ogadham hi rādha brahmacariyam vussati nibbāna parāyanam nibbāna pariyosānam ti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai rādhaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sattoti vuccatī”ti?
analyzed: kittāvatā nu kho bhante satto ti vuccati iti

original: “Rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasmā sattoti vuccati.
analyzed: rūpe kho rādha chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā tatra satto tatra visatto tasmā satto ti vuccati

original: viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto, tatra visatto, tasmā sattoti vuccati.
analyzed: viññāṇe yaḥ chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā tatra satto tatra visatto tasmā satto ti vuccati

original: Seyyathāpi, rādha, kumārakā vā kumārikāyo vā paṁsvāgārakehi kīḷanti.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api rādha kumārakāḥ vā kumārikāyaḥ vā pasvāgārakehi kīḷanti

original: Yāvakīvañca tesu paṁsvāgārakesu avigatarāgā honti avigatacchandā avigatapemā avigatapipāsā
analyzed: tesu pasu āgārakesu avigata rāgāḥ honti avigata chandāḥ avigata pemāḥ avigata pipāsāḥ

original: avigatapariḷāhā avigatataṇhā, tāva tāni paṁsvāgārakāni allīyanti keḷāyanti dhanāyanti mamāyanti.
analyzed: avigata pariḷāhā avigata taṇhā tāva tāni pasvāgārakāni allīyanti keḷāyanti dhanāyanti mamāyanti

original: Yato ca kho, rādha, kumārakā vā kumārikāyo vā tesu paṁsvāgārakesu vigatarāgā honti
analyzed: yatas ca kho rādha kumārakāḥ vā kumārikāyaḥ vā tesu pasvāgārakesu vigata rāgāḥ honti

original: vigatacchandā vigatapemā vigatapipāsā vigatapariḷāhā vigatataṇhā, atha kho tāni paṁsvāgārakāni
analyzed: vigata chandāḥ vigata pemāḥ vigata pipāsāḥ vigata pariḷāhāḥ vigata taṇhāḥ atha khalu tāni pasvāgārakāni

original: hatthehi ca pādehi ca vikiranti vidhamanti viddhaṁsenti vikīḷaniyaṁ karonti.
analyzed: hatthehi ca pādehi ca vikiranti vidhamanti viddhasenti vikīḍaniyam karonti

original: Evameva kho, rādha, tumhepi rūpaṁ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
analyzed: evam eva kho rādha tumhe api rūpam vikiratha vidhamatha viddhasetha vikīḷaniyam karotha taṇhā khayāya paṭipajjatha

original: Vedanaṁ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
analyzed: vedanam vikiratha vidhamatha viddhasetha vikīḷaniyam karotha taṇhā kkhayāya paṭipajjatha

original: saṅkhāre vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
analyzed: saṅkhāre vikiratha vidhamatha viddhasetha vikīḷaniyam karotha taṇhā kkhayāya paṭipajjatha

original: Viññāṇaṁ vikiratha vidhamatha viddhaṁsetha vikīḷaniyaṁ karotha taṇhākkhayāya paṭipajjatha.
analyzed: viññāṇam vikiratha vidhamatha viddhasetha vikīḷaniyam karotha taṇhā kkhayāya paṭipajjatha

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai rādhaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca
bhava netti nirodhaḥ bhava netti nirodhaḥ ti bhante vuccati

original: Katamā nu kho, bhante, bhavanetti, katamo bhavanettinirodho”ti?
analyzed: katamā nu kho bhante bhavanā itti katamaḥ bhavanā itti nirodhaḥ ti

original: “Rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā—
analyzed: rūpe kho chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā ye cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā
viññāṇe yaḥ chandaḥ pe adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā
tesam nirodhaḥ bhavana itti nirodhaḥ ti

original: Āyasmā rādho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: rādhaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam kho āyasmantam rādham bhagavā etat avoca

original: “Pariññeyye ca, rādha, dhamme desessāmi pariññañca pariññātāviṁ puggalañca.
analyzed: pariññeyye ca rādha dhamme desessāmi pariññañca pariññātāvim puggalañca

original: Taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā rādho bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmato rādhaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, pariññeyyo dhammo, vedanā pariññeyyo dhammo, saññā pariññeyyo dhammo, saṅkhārā pariññeyyo dhammo, viññāṇaṁ pariññeyyo dhammo.
analyzed: rūpam kho rādha pariññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ vedanā pariññeyyaḥ dhammo saññā pariññeyyaḥ dhammo saṅkhārāḥ pariññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ viññāṇam pariññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ

original: Yo kho, rādha, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
analyzed: yaḥ kho rādha rāga khayaḥ dosa khayaḥ moha khayaḥ
ayam vuccati rādha pariññātāvī puggalo ti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu āyasmantam rādham bhagavān etat avoca
rūpa upādāna khandhaḥ vedanā upādāna khandhaḥ saññu pādāna khandhaḥ saṅkhāru pādāna khandhaḥ viññāṇu pādāna khandhaḥ

original: Ye hi keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti;
analyzed: ye hi keci samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam assādam ca ādīnavam ca nissaraṇam ca yathābhūtam na pajānanti

original: na me te, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā,
analyzed: na me te rādha samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā samaṇesu vā samaṇa sammatāḥ brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇa sammatā

original: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā
analyzed: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmañña attham vā brahmañña attham vā diṭṭhā iva dhamme sayam abhiññā

original: Ye ca kho keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti;
analyzed: ye ca kho keci samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam assādam ca ādīnavam ca nissaraṇam ca yathābhūtam pajānanti

original: te kho me, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca
analyzed: te khalu me rādha samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā samaṇesu ca iva samaṇa sammatāḥ brāhmaṇesu ca

original: brāhmaṇasammatā, te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme
analyzed: brāhmaṇa sammatā te ca pana āyasmanto sāmañña ttham ca brahmañña ttham ca diṭṭhe iva dhamme
sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti iti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu āyasmantam rādham bhagavān etat avoca
rūpa upādāna khandho pe viññāṇa upādāna khandho

original: Ye hi keci, rādha, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti …pe…
analyzed: ye hi keci samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtam na pajānanti pe
sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti iti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu āyasmantam rādham bhagavān etat avoca
rūpa upādāna khandho pe viññāṇa upādāna khandho

original: Yato kho, rādha, ariyasāvako imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti—
analyzed: yatas kho rādha ariya sāvakaḥ imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: ayaṁ vuccati, rādha, ariyasāvako sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
analyzed: ayam vuccati ariya sāvako sotāpannaḥ a vinipāta dhammo niyataḥ sambodhi parāyano ti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu āyasmantam rādham bhagavān etat avoca
rūpa upādāna khandho pe viññāṇa upādāna khandho

original: Yato kho, rādha, bhikkhu imesaṁ pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ viditvā anupādāvimutto hoti—
analyzed: yatas kho rādha bhikkhu imesam pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtam viditvā an upādā vimuttaḥ hoti

original: ayaṁ vuccati, rādha, bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto”ti.
analyzed: ayam vuccati rādha bhikkhu araham khīṇa āsavaḥ vusitavā kata karaṇīyaḥ ohita bhāraḥ an uppatta sadattho parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanaḥ sammadaññā vimutto ti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu āyasmantam rādham bhagavān etat avoca

original: “rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
analyzed: rūpe kho rādha chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā tam pajahatha

original: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
analyzed: evam tam rūpam pahīnam bhavissati ucchinna mūlam tālāvatthukatam anabhāvaṅkatam āyatim an uppāda dhamma

original: Vedanāya yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
analyzed: vedanāya yā u chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā tam pajahatha

original: Evaṁ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
analyzed: evam sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatim an uppāda dhammā

original: saṅkhāresu yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
analyzed: saṅkhāresu yā u chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā tam pajahatha

original: Evaṁ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
analyzed: evam te saṅkhārā pahīnāḥ bhavissanti ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatim an uppāda dhammā

original: Viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, taṁ pajahatha.
analyzed: viññāṇe yaḥ chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā tam pajahatha

original: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati …pe… anuppādadhamman”ti.
analyzed: evam tat viññāṇam pahīnam bhavissati pe an uppāda dhammanti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rādhaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu āyasmantam rādham bhagavān etat avoca

original: “rūpe kho, rādha, yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
analyzed: rūpe kho rādha chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā ye cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā te pajahatha

original: Evaṁ taṁ rūpaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
analyzed: evam tam rūpam pahīnam bhavissati ucchinna mūlam tālāvatthukatam anabhāvaṅkatam āyatim an uppāda dhamma

original: Vedanāya yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
analyzed: vedanāya chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā ye cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā te pajahatha

original: Evaṁ sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
analyzed: evam sā vedanā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatim an uppāda dhammā

original: saṅkhāresu yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
analyzed: saṅkhāresu yā chandaḥ yā rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā ye cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā te pajahatha

original: Evaṁ te saṅkhārā pahīnā bhavissanti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
analyzed: evam te saṅkhārā pahīnāḥ bhavissanti ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatim an uppāda dhammā

original: Viññāṇe yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upayupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te pajahatha.
analyzed: viññāṇe yaḥ chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā ye cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā te pajahatha

original: Evaṁ taṁ viññāṇaṁ pahīnaṁ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhamman”ti.
analyzed: evam tam viññāṇam pahīnam bhavissati ucchinna mūlam tālāvatthukatam anabhāvaṅkatam āyatim an uppāda dhammanti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai rādhaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca
katamaḥ nu kho bhante māraḥ iti

original: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, māro, vedanā māro, saññā māro, saṅkhārā māro, viññāṇaṁ māro.
analyzed: rūpam kho rādha māraḥ vedanā māraḥ saññā māraḥ saṅkhārāḥ māraḥ viññāṇam māraḥ

original: Evaṁ passaṁ, rādha, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati.
analyzed: evam passa rādha sutavā ariya sāvakaḥ rūpasmim pi nibbindati vedanāya api nibbindati saññāya api nibbindati saṅkhāresu pi nibbindati viññāṇasmim pi nibbindati

original: Nibbindaṁ virajjati; virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
analyzed: nibbindam virajjati virāgā vimuccati vimuttasmin vimuttam iti ñāṇam hoti

original: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti iti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai rādhaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca
māra dhammo māra dhammo ti bhante vuccati
katamaḥ nu kho bhante māra dhammaḥ ti

original: “Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, māradhammo, vedanā māradhammo, saññā māradhammo, saṅkhārā māradhammo, viññāṇaṁ māradhammo.

original: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṁ desetu, yamahaṁ bhagavato dhammaṁ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
